Related Projects About

Related Projects

Below are known implementation repositories associated with IoTFoundry.

PICMG IoT Firmware
Reference MCTP and PLDM firmware implementations maintained by PICMG. (status: reference)
IoTorch
This project will be renamed or removed and its contents will be refactored into several new projects. (status: in progress)
IoT Configurator
An example configurator for the PICMG IoT Reference Firmware. (status: reference)
IoT Builder
A firmware builder for the PICMG IoT Reference Firmware. (status: reference)

If you maintain a repository that should be listed here, please open a pull request adding it to _data/projects.yml.

See repository for license and governance documents.
